import React, {useState} from 'react'; import {useNavigate} from "react-router-dom"; import {ROUTE_HOME, ROUTE_LOGIN, ROUTE_MEMORY} from "../../utils/consts"; import {useSelector} from "react-redux"; import {useActions} from "../../hooks/useActions"; import imgUserLogo from "../../img/user.svg"; const Navbar = ({isOpenMenu}) => { const navigate = useNavigate() const isAuth = useSelector(state => state.authReducer.isAuth) const {logOut} = useActions() const [isEditLogo, setIsEditLogo] = useState(false) const exit = () => { logOut() navigate(ROUTE_LOGIN) } const handleSubmitForm = (e) => { setIsEditLogo(false) e.preventDefault() } return ( isAuth ?
navigate(ROUTE_HOME)}>Головна
navigate(ROUTE_MEMORY)}>Спогади
setIsEditLogo(true)}>
Вийти
:
navigate(ROUTE_HOME)}>Головна
setIsEditLogo(true)}>
navigate(ROUTE_LOGIN)}>Вхід
); }; export default Navbar;
